title: Remove the unused Farms and increase Niu denominated farm APR?
body:
Some of the farms are really pointless:
1. Niu-XVS LP for 7.91% APR
2. Niu-SXP LP for 5.93% APR
3. Niu-BTCB LP for 12.40% APR

New investors coming to the platform would laugh their way out.

Remove these farms and increase the APR for more utilized farms, like Niu-BUSD and Niu-BNB
author: 0xC78B5a4c5bC75DfafE4188766d9c8F7408681AE6
